verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: may] be against abortion , but his scalding rhetoric and inhumane policies are the antithesis of the whole pro - life worldview .
[ARG1: Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: may] [V: be] [ARG2: against abortion] , but his scalding rhetoric and inhumane policies are the antithesis of the whole pro - life worldview .
Donald Trump may be against abortion , but [ARG1: his scalding rhetoric and inhumane policies] [V: are] [ARG2: the antithesis of the whole pro - life worldview] .
